about_the_game:
Following the Louisiana Purchase, President Thomas Jefferson needs your help.

As a Corps of Discovery leader, you'll conduct the expedition throughout the unexplored interior of North America with the goal of finding a convenient passage from the Missouri River up to the Pacific Ocean. Throughout the journey, you will encounter and examine a lot of new plants and animals, but most notably - a lot of native American tribes of the great plains. Using violence or diplomacy you will strive to survive, and if you're lucky enough - your expedition will succeed.

Beware of Grizzly bears, barking squirrels, and the little people of Pryor Mountains.
detailed_description:
Following the Louisiana Purchase, President Thomas Jefferson needs your help.

As a Corps of Discovery leader, you'll conduct the expedition throughout the unexplored interior of North America with the goal of finding a convenient passage from the Missouri River up to the Pacific Ocean. Throughout the journey, you will encounter and examine a lot of new plants and animals, but most notably - a lot of native American tribes of the great plains. Using violence or diplomacy you will strive to survive, and if you're lucky enough - your expedition will succeed.

Beware of Grizzly bears, barking squirrels, and the little people of Pryor Mountains.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern linux distribution
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Lewis & Clark Expedition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Lewis & Clark Expedition is a Strategy game with elements of RPG. As a Corps of Discovery leader, you'll conduct the expedition throughout the unexplored interior of North America with the goal of finding a convenient passage from the Missouri River up to the Pacific Ocean.
